fig.label: Fig. 49.6

caption.p: Bordetella pertussis infection begins with infection of the respiratory tract. The toxins elaborated during the infection have multiple effects which modulate the immune response.

fig.attrib: Figure reprinted from Carbonetti NH. Immunomodulation in the pathogenesis of Bordetella pertussis infection and. Curr Opin Pharmacol 2007;7(3):272–8 with permission from Elsevier.
